com.g2mobility.xbee.recycler

Class XBeeMessageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.g2mobility.xbee.recycler.XBeeMessageAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnLongClickListener

    public class XBeeMessageAdapter
extends 
implements android.view.View.OnLongClickListener
    RecyclerView adapter for the XBeeNodesFragment.

    This adapter uses view holder to hold inflated recycler view items and binds them to com.rapplogic.xbee.api.zigbee.NodeDiscover.
